description: A secret underground factory hidden beneath the Corrida Colosseum where artificial Devil Fruits called SMILE are produced. The factory is staffed by 500 enslaved Tontatta dwarves including Princess Mansherry, who are forced to cultivate the artificial fruits for Doflamingo's black market trade with Kaido.

keyEvents.title: Factory Revealed to Hold 500 Captive Dwarves
keyEvents.description: Leo reveals that 500 Tontatta dwarves are enslaved in the SMILE factory, including their princess Mansherry.
keyEvents.significance: Exposes the cruelty of Doflamingo's operation and the dwarves' motivation for rebellion.

keyEvents.title: Factory Location Revealed Beneath Corrida Colosseum
keyEvents.description: Leo reveals that the SMILE factory is hidden in the basement directly beneath the Corrida Colosseum where Luffy is fighting.
keyEvents.significance: Connects multiple storylines and sets up the eventual raid on the factory.

statusHistory.reason: Factory is operational and producing SMILE fruits

description: An island north of Dressrosa connected by a bridge. The island features dense forest and is home to the underground Tontatta Kingdom. It serves as the meeting point for the exchange between Law and Doflamingo.

keyEvents.title: Law Battles Fujitora and Doflamingo
keyEvents.description: Trafalgar Law struggles against the combined assault of Admiral Fujitora and Doflamingo at Green Bit.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location showing the overwhelming power Law faces.

keyEvents.title: Battle Shakes Underground Tontatta Kingdom
keyEvents.description: The intense battle at Green Bit causes the underground Tontatta Kingdom to shake violently.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale and intensity of the battle above.

description: A massive colosseum in Dressrosa where a tournament is held for the Mera Mera no Mi. The arena is surrounded by Marines waiting to arrest criminals. Unknown to most, the SMILE factory is hidden in its basement.

keyEvents.title: Chinjao Explains Becoming Pirate King
keyEvents.description: Don Chinjao tells Luffy that the King of the Pirates must conquer all conquerors in the New World.
keyEvents.significance: Important philosophical moment about what it means to achieve the ultimate dream.

keyEvents.title: Marines Notice Missing Tournament Losers
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Bastille and the Marines outside notice that no losers have emerged from the tournament.
keyEvents.significance: Builds mystery about what's happening to defeated fighters.

keyEvents.title: Revealed to Hide SMILE Factory in Basement
keyEvents.description: Leo reveals that the SMILE factory where 500 dwarves are enslaved is hidden directly beneath the colosseum.
keyEvents.significance: Connects Luffy's storyline to the factory subplot and sets up future events.
